00024 #ifndef BOOZ_FMS_TEST_SIGNAL_H
00025 #define BOOZ_FMS_TEST_SIGNAL_H
00026 
00027 #include "std.h"
00028 
00029 
00030 enum fms_ts_mode {
00031   STEP_ROLL,
00032   STEP_PITCH,
00033   STEP_YAW,
00034   STEP_VERT
00035 };
00036 
00037 struct BoozFmsTestSignal {
00038   enum fms_ts_mode mode;
00039   uint32_t period;
00040   uint32_t amplitude;
00041   uint32_t counter;
00042 };
00043 
00044 extern struct BoozFmsTestSignal fms_test_signal;
00045 
00046 #define booz_fms_test_signal_SetPeriod(_val) {    \
00047     fms_test_signal.period = _val;      \
00048     fms_test_signal.counter = 0;            \
00049   }
00050 
00051 #define booz_fms_test_signal_SetMode(_val) {    \
00052     fms_test_signal.mode = (enum fms_ts_mode)(_val);  \
00053     fms_test_signal.counter = 0;      \
00054   }
00055 
00056 #endif /* BOOZ_FMS_TEST_SIGNAL_H */
